name: Quor - University Project
description:
Quor - University Project

Quor is a board game developed by Sandlarz Nino, Besancenot Henri and Hua Zhichun for a Sorbonne University project.

It provides online multiplayer,  advanced AI and a genetic algorithm to determine the best parameters.

Controls :

Left Click : Move / Put a wall

Right Click : Change wall orientation
